content.question: Based on the graph, the increased availability of antibiotics and vaccines after circa 1955 is most clearly associated with

choices.label: a greater decline in the death rates for Mexico than in the death rates for Sweden
equal rates of decline in the death rates for Mexico and Sweden
a greater increase in the birth rates for Mexico than in the birth rates for Sweden
a greater increase in the overall population in Sweden than in the overall population in Mexico

content.answer: a greater decline in the death rates for Mexico than in the death rates for Sweden

topic.text: 9.1: Advances in Technology and Exchange after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
